note.p: Also known as Anna Maria Jeffryes. Daughter of Edward and Ann Jeffreys of Shrewsbury. Married William Pemberton Cludde in 1781.
Burke’s landed gentry 1952, s.v. Herbert of Orleton.
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 June 2019)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/1844/32 )
